# Preface {.unnumbered}

This book examines the fascinating intersection of nutritional anthropology and oral health, exploring how our dietary past informs our present and future oral health challenges.

## About This Book

The Human Diet: A Nutritional Anthropology of Oral Health bridges multiple disciplines to provide a comprehensive view of how human dietary patterns have evolved and their impact on oral health.
